original_text: Ahab had decided to do everything that the Lord said was evil. He was more wicked than any other person who had lived. His wife Jezebel helped him to be like that.
korean_text: 예로부터 아합과 같이 그 자신을 팔아 여호와 앞에서 악을 행한 자가 없음은 그를 그의 아내 이세벨이 충동하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Ahab had decided to do everything
that the Lord said was evil
He was more wicked than any other person
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 어떤 사람보다 더 악했습니다
